price: dan lemparkanlah tongkatmu".  Maka tatkala (tongkat itu menjadi ular dan) Musa melihatnya bergerak-gerak seperti dia seekor ular yang gesit, larilah ia berbalik ke belakang tanpa menoleh.  "Hai Musa, janganlah kamu takut.  Sesungguhnya orang yang dijadikan rasul tidak takut di hadapan-Ku.
arabic: وَأَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۚ فَلَمَّا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَآنّٞ وَلَّىٰ مُدۡبِرٗا وَلَمۡ يُعَقِّبۡۚ يَٰمُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنِّي لَا يَخَافُ لَدَيَّ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alqi ʿaṣāka falammā raāhā tahtazzu ka-annahā jānnun wallā mud'biran walam yuʿaqqib yāmūsā lā takhaf innī lā yakhāfu ladayya al-mur'salūna
